actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 278 - 122 (Record Vote No: 17).

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects the following Members of the House of Representatives to the specified committees: (1) H. Martin Lancaster, to the Committee on Armed Services; and (2) Bob Clement, to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation and the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
